page.title: 16LOCAL OPINIONS IN WEDMORE
page.content: From our questionaire results we have found out that the majority of people in Wedmore like the{peace}of the village and the{countryside. } Most people object to the traffic which travels through the village, if it is a big lorry it can be very dangerous going around tight corners. They also do not want double yellow lines or a one way system. They want a {car park}preferably by the vicarage, near the shops. Villagers also like being near main {tourist attractions}and big towns. Hardly anyone wants Wedmore to get bigger, with new housing estates and to become a busy town. Older residents used not to regard anyone who came to live in the village as a{"local"}until they had served twenty years!
